item.title: gpg encrypt user emails with rails
item.description: While using kraken.com to do some basic crypto trading, I came across what I think is a great feature. If you go to your account settings, you will find that you can add a PGP Public Key. Once you add your public key, all emails containing sensitive information will be encrypted for that public key before being sent to you. I wish more of the sites I use had this feature.
